short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Personalize your LinkedIn messages with company news

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Personalize your LinkedIn messages with real-time company news. Increase your response rate.

Trying to reach out to cold prospects on LinkedIn? Our tool helps you generate ideas to craft a personalized message within seconds!

Currently only works on LinkedIn profiles. We will release updates soon for Gmail and LinkedIn Sales Navigator.
